meanings.definition: To partially bake (a food item) before finishing the cooking process.
meanings.sent1: I will parbake the pizza crust before adding the toppings.
meanings.sent2: It is common to parbake bread before putting it in the oven to finish baking.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cookie go to therapy? Because it couldn't handle the pressure of being parbaked!
meanings.sent4: The idea of parbaking the cake was like taking a break in the middle of a marathon.
meanings.sent5: The chef decided to parbake the cookies to ensure they were perfectly crispy.

meanings.sent1: The bakery sells parbakes that customers can finish baking at home.
meanings.sent2: She bought a parbake of croissants to have a quick breakfast option.
meanings.sent3: The parbake of cinnamon rolls looked so tempting that she couldn't resist buying them.
meanings.sent4: The kitchen was filled with the delicious aroma of the parbake as it finished baking.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of having parbakes in the freezer made meal prep much easier.
